data.title: transnistria - English definition, grammar, pronunciation, synonyms and examples
data.meta_description: Learn the definition of 'transnistria'. Check out the pronunciation, synonyms and grammar. Browse the use examples 'transnistria' in the great English corpus.
data.text:
transnistria in English dictionary

Meanings and definitions of "transnistria"

An autonomous territory within Moldova, not internationally recognized as a nation. It is the only part of Moldova in which the Cyrillic alphabet is official, while the Latin alphabet is generally "restricted".

proper

(historical)

A governorate of Romania during World War II, established in 1941 and captured by Soviet forces in 1944.

proper

An autonomous territory within Moldova, not internationally recognized as a nation.

Transnistria, an autonomous territory in Moldova

Transnistria (World War II)
